tool.name: Get values of a study factor
tool.description: Get list of factor values for given factor used in a MetaboLights study

param.name: mtbls_id
param.label: MetaboLights Study Identifier
param.help: MTBLS ID available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS2.

param.name: factor_name
param.label: Factor name to filter on.
param.help: Factor name relevant to the specified MetaboLights study, e.g. genotype. You can get a study's factor names by using the study_factors tool.

tool.help:
================================================== Get list of study factors for a MetaboLights study ==================================================
This tool gets the list of factor values from a MetaboLights study for a given study factor name. It extracts the factor values from the ISA-Tab study and assay tables for the MetaboLights study.
----- Input -----
ISA-Tab input source ==================== Choose an input source, either direct from Metabolights or from an ISA-Tab history item that has already been downloaded or created in Galaxy.
MetaboLights Study Identifier ============================= If the input source is Metabolights, then provide the MTBLS identifier available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS2.
ISA-Tab datatype history item ============================= If the input source is an ISA-Tab history item, select from existing data history items. ISA-Tab items can be created by using the Metabolights downloader or the ISA-Tab metadata creation tools.
Factor name =========== A factor name from the list of factors in the study metadata. You can get the relevant factor names for a particular study by using the `study_factors` tool.
------ Output ------
List of factor values as JSON =============================
A list of factor values for the specified factor name as a JSON list. e.g.
:: ["Exp2", "Exp1"]
